segments.text: Wow, that's a lot of water coming out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're really going for it with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to go any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely absorbed in her task, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the floor isn't more slippery with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a little adventure unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all make it out of this situation unscathed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's certainly an interesting scene, that's for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I'll remember this moment for a long time.
segments.speaker: PAR
